subject: Mascots
lead_paragraph: Jean-Claude Tremblay, who has persisted through the decades in the most specialized of professions, runs a company that produces between 150 and 200 mascots a year, most of them for sports franchises.
snippet: Jean-Claude Tremblay, who has persisted through the decades in the most specialized of professions, runs a company that produces between 150 and 200 mascots a year, most of them for sports franchises.
